page.title: 11Organisations in Frome
page.content: {Charities:}Frome raises lots of money for charities e.g Rheumatism and Arthritis, Cancer, Disabled, Dr. Barnados, Frome hospitals, St. John's Ambulance, Save the Children Fund, Red Cross, R.N.L.I. and the blind. {Hobbies: }There are societies for bee- keeping, photography, dog training, Floral art, Frome fanciers, Goat keep- ing, Wine making, folk dancing & walking. {Music:} They can join the Operatic Society, Town Band, Music Society, & Choral Union, - all are very active. {Youth:}e.g. Guides, Scouts, Red Cross, Majorettes, & St John's Ambulance. The Red Cross Marching Band is the only one in the country. It has 50 members. {Adults}can join the Lions, Masons, W.I., Rotary, T.G., Round Table etc.
